mapper.select: SELECT u_id AS questionValue, category_name AS categoryName FROM TB_QUESTION tq LEFT JOIN TB_CATEGORY tc ON tq.category_id = tc.category_id GROUP BY tq.category_id

SELECT u_id AS id, tp.type_name AS type FROM TB_QUESTION AS q LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CATEGORY AS cg ON cg.category_id = q.category_id LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_TYPE AS tp ON tp.type_id = q.is_apply WHERE cg.category_name = #{category} AND q_id > ( SELECT q_id FROM TB_QUESTION WHERE u_id = #{docId} LIMIT 1 ) LIMIT #{cnt}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_QUESTION(category_id, u_id, is_apply) SELECT category_id, '${uId}', '${isApply}' FROM TB_CATEGORY WHERE category_name = #{categoryName}
